summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Season Tracker app with both backend and frontend testing. All core functionality working correctly including season detection, hemisphere switching, progress tracking, and notification preferences.
passed_tests: Season data retrieval for Northern hemisphere showing Winter with 57% progress
Season data retrieval for Southern hemisphere showing Summer (opposite season)
Winter affirmation retrieval with valid seasonal message
Frontend loads correctly showing Winter season for Northern hemisphere
Affirmation card displays text and refresh button works
Season details show correct days: 50 elapsed, 38 remaining, 88 total
Season date range shows 'December 21 â€” March 19' correctly
Hemisphere toggle switches between Northern (Winter) and Southern (Summer)
Notification toggle is present and clickable with proper browser permission handling
Mobile responsive layout works properly at 390px width
All interactive elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
